verbose_text: Based on these findings, she was diagnosed with severe acute pancreatitis and treatment was initiated with gabexate mesilate (2000 mg/d) and meropenem (1000 mg/d) under fasting conditions.7 On day 15, her CRP levels and serum amylase levels normalized and she was observed to have recovered from pancreatitis; thus, the oral intake was started under calorie and fat restriction.
